doc:
Sam Wood https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Wood 0 Samuel Grosvenor Wood (July 10, 1883 – September 22, 1949) was an American film director and producer, who was best known for directing such Hollywood hits as A Night at the Opera, A Day at the Races, Goodbye, Mr. Chips, and The Pride of the Yankees. He was also involved in a few acting and writing projects. Samuel_Grosvenor_Wood ( July_10_,_1883 – September_22_,_1949 ) was an_American_film_director_and_producer , who was_best_known for directing such_Hollywood_hits as A_Night at the_Opera , A_Day at the_Races , Goodbye , Mr._Chips , and The_Pride of the_Yankees . He was_also_involved in a_few_acting_and_writing_projects .
